text:
@AOC No.
 it's because they keep gathering together and spreading the virus.
 You are one of the biggest racists I've ever seen in my life.
 Stop trying to create a race war.
 Maybe if you'd do your job instead of gossiping like a school girl we'd be in better shape.
#WuhanVirus
